title: The Day After I Confessed My Feelings to My Favorite Idol at a Handshake Event, The Girl in The Nearby Seat With Her Eyes Hidden Started Acting Strange? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Dense Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Otaku   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Showbiz
author: Nekokuro   ネコクロ
description:
— “I like you. I’ve always liked you.”

A sudden confession made at an idol handshake session. This was not an unusual scene. However, Yorito’s fate began to change drastically after this confession.

The next day, the girl sitting next to him, her eyes hidden by her bangs, changed her attitude completely. Up until now, they had only greeted each other lightly, but for some reason, the girl with hidden eyes was watching Yorito.

When Yorito returns from lunch, he finds a cute envelope with a letter in it in his desk. The envelope and letter had no name written on it, just a request to come to the rooftop after school. Yorito went to the rooftop as stated in the letter.

And what was waiting for him there was the girl sitting next to him.>
